info.title: GeoWave API
info.description: REST API for GeoWave CLI commands

post.description: Configure an index for usage in GeoWave

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: [name]

parameters.name: makeDefault
parameters.description: Make this the default index creating stores

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of index, such as spatial, or spatial_temporal

post.description: Create an index group for usage in GeoWave

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: [name] [comma separated list of indexes]

post.description: Create a store within Geowave

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: [name]

parameters.name: makeDefault
parameters.description: Make this the default store in all operations

parameters.name: storeType
parameters.description: The type of store, such as accumulo, memory, etc

post.description: Copy and modify existing index configuration

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: [name] [new name]

parameters.name: makeDefault
parameters.description: Make this the default index creating stores

post.description: Copy and modify existing store configuration

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: [name] [new name]

parameters.name: makeDefault
parameters.description: Make this the default store in all operations

post.description: Remove index configuration from Geowave configuration

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: [name]

post.description: Remove index group from Geowave configuration

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: [name]

post.description: Remove store from Geowave configuration

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: [name]

post.description: Set property name within cache

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: [name] [value]

post.description: Subscribe to a Kafka topic and ingest into GeoWave

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: [store name] [comma delimited index/group list]

parameters.name: visibility
parameters.description: The visibility of the data ingested (optional; default is 'public')

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: A string that uniquely identifies the group of consumer processes to which this consumer belongs. By setting the same group id multiple processes indicate that they are all part of the same consumer group.

parameters.name: extensions
parameters.description: individual or comma-delimited set of file extensions to accept (optional)

post.description: List supported data store types, index types, and ingest formats
Ingest supported files in local file system directly, without using HDFS

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: [file or directory] [storename] [comma delimited index/group list]

parameters.name: visibility
parameters.description: The visibility of the data ingested (optional; default is 'public')

parameters.name: extensions
parameters.description: individual or comma-delimited set of file extensions to accept (optional)

parameters.name: threads
parameters.description: number of threads to use for ingest, default to 1 (optional)

post.description: Stage supported files in local file system to HDFS

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: [file or directory] [hdfs host:port] [path to base directory to write to]

parameters.name: extensions
parameters.description: individual or comma-delimited set of file extensions to accept (optional)

post.description: Stage supported files in local file system to a Kafka topic

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: [file or directory]

parameters.name: metadataBrokerList
parameters.description: This is for bootstrapping and the producer will only use it for getting metadata (topics, partitions and replicas). The socket connections for sending the actual data will be established based on the broker information returned in the metadata. The format is host1:port1,host2:port2, and the list can be a subset of brokers or a VIP pointing to a subset of brokers.

parameters.name: extensions
parameters.description: individual or comma-delimited set of file extensions to accept (optional)

post.description: Copy supported files from local file system to HDFS and ingest from HDFS

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: [file or directory] [hdfs host:port] [path to base directory to write to] [store name] [comma delimited index/group list]

parameters.name: visibility
parameters.description: The visibility of the data ingested (optional; default is 'public')

parameters.name: jobTrackerHostPort
parameters.description: Hadoop job tracker hostname and port in the format hostname:port

parameters.name: extensions
parameters.description: individual or comma-delimited set of file extensions to accept (optional)

post.description: Ingest supported files that already exist in HDFS

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: [hdfs host:port] [path to base directory to write to] [store name] [comma delimited index/group list]

parameters.name: visibility
parameters.description: The visibility of the data ingested (optional; default is 'public')

parameters.name: jobTrackerHostPort
parameters.description: Hadoop job tracker hostname and port in the format hostname:port

parameters.name: extensions
parameters.description: individual or comma-delimited set of file extensions to accept (optional)

post.description: Calculate a specific statistic in the remote store, given adapter ID and statistic ID

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: [store name] [adapterId] [statId]

parameters.name: authorizations
parameters.description: The authorizations used for the statistics calculation as a subset of the accumulo user authorization; by default all authorizations are used.

post.description: Clear ALL data from a GeoWave store and delete tables

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: [store name]

post.description: Display all adapters in this remote store

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: [store name]

post.description: Display all indices in this remote store

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: [store name]

post.description: Print statistics of an existing GeoWave dataset to standard output.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: [store name] [[adapter name]]

parameters.name: authorizations
parameters.description: The authorizations used for the statistics calculation as a subset of the accumulo user authorization; by default all authorizations are used.

post.description: Calculate the statistics of an existing GeoWave dataset

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: [store name] [[adapter name]]

parameters.name: authorizations
parameters.description: The authorizations used for the statistics calculation as a subset of the accumulo user authorization; by default all authorizations are used.

post.description: Remove an adapter from the remote store and all associated data for the adapter

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: [store name] [adapterId]

post.description: Remove an index from the remote store and all associated data for the index

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: [store name] [indexId]

post.description: Remove a statistic from the remote store. You will be prompted with are you sure

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: [store name] [adapterId] [statId]

parameters.name: authorizations
parameters.description: The authorizations used for the statistics calculation as a subset of the accumulo user authorization; by default all authorizations are used.
